listOfOnChainDeals.title: List of all deals on chain with stats

awaitingPublished.title: Awaiting publish
awaitingPublished.tooltip: deals accepted by CIDgravity but not published yet. Only apply to deals manage by CIDgravity.

sealing.title: Under sealing
sealing.tooltip: deals published on chain but not active yet. (this applies to any deals processed, whether utilizing CIDgravity or not.)

active.title: Completed
active.tooltip: data successfully processed and store by SPs. (this applies to any deals processed, whether utilizing CIDgravity or not.)

remainingDatacapNotLocked.title: Remaining Datacap not locked
remainingDatacapNotLocked.tooltip: available onchain datacap - current deals awaiting being published

publishedExpired.title: Published expired
publishedExpired.tooltip: deals which failed during the sealing stage
